content.rendered:
License and Regulations

Windsor Brokers has been offering investment services and activities to its clients since 1988. “Windsor Brokers” is a brand name used by the following companies:

Windsor Brokers (BZ) Ltd

licensed by the Financial Service Commission of Belize for providing Brokerage, Consultancy, Advisory Services, as well as trading in securities.

View License

Windsor Brokers Ltd

authorised and regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (licence number 030/04), the supervisory and regulatory authority for investment services in Cyprus. CySEC is a member of the European Securities and Markets Authorities.

Seldon Investments (Jordan) Ltd

authorised and regulated by the Jordan Securities Commission (JSC) which was established in 1997 as a public institution with financial and administrative autonomy to develop, regulate and monitor Jordan’s capital market to maintain a sound investment environment and protect investors. The JSC is entrusted with developing the capital market in accordance with international standards to secure fairness, safety and attract domestic and foreign investors.

View Seldon Investments (Jordan) Ltd License

Windsor Brokers International Ltd

is regulated by the Financial Services Authority in Seychelles, offering its services within the rest of the world except USA and EEA.

Windsor Markets (Kenya) Limited

Authorized and regulated by the Capital Markets Authority of Kenya (CMA), which is the regulating body charged with the responsibility of supervising, licensing and monitoring the activities of market intermediaries licensed under the Capital Markets Act

2023 HALF YEAR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
2022 FULL YEAR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
2022 HALF YEAR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
2021 Full Year Financial Statements
